description:
Right after Yoshino announces that he is going to a hot spring resort with his chief assistant and friend Yanase, Hatori says "Do you even remember what`s on that day?".
While he is still confused, Hatori throws him out of his apartment. Yoshino does not understand Hatori`s problem and indignantly goes to the hot springs with Yanase, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Absence Makes the Heart Grow Fonder.
